main
Class SOSServer

java.lang.Object
  main.SOSServer

public abstract class SOSServer
extends java.lang.Object

The main object to start the server. This class should be extended by every application.

Author:
Gerben G. Meyer

Constructor Detail

SOSServer

public SOSServer(java.util.Properties settings,
                 AgentFactory factory,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> passwords)
The SOS Server. It instantiates the AgentCollection class which runs all Agents and AgentProcessors.

Parameters:
settings - the Properties to be used for this server
factory - an AgentFactory for producing agents
passwords - a HashMap with an username as key and a password as value
